name: Palm Beach Gardens Marriott

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for one night on business/ I read all the reviews on Tripadvisors so I knew that the property was recently renovated. The decor were definately clean and new. The room was on the small side. I was disappointed by the bathroom set up. The sink outside of the bathroom. The vent would turn on in the bathroom when you turn on the light - rally really loud...

reviews.title: slightly above average
reviews.text: The bed had great sheets - wonderful comforter (rather than those blanket sheets. The matterace was a little too soft for me - actually I didn't sleep too well b/c of it. The front desk told me to tell them next time in advance and they'd put something hard under it.

reviews.title: Very nice property but overpriced...
reviews.text: I was really tired when I got there and ordered room service from the in-hotel restaurant. It was a great roasted bass - highly recommend it if you're stuck ordering room service.

reviews.title: Will be wonderful
reviews.text: The water pressure was good. The towels looked a little worn, though.

reviews.title: Recommended Property - nice amenities
reviews.text: Overall I would stay there again.

reviews.title: Don't Stay at this Place!!
reviews.text: I stayed here and reserved the bed/breakfast package. No one told me this hotel was being taken over by a Jewish event and the kitchen was kosher. So no breakfast for me. Also, the vending machines were unplugged and covered and the pool was closed to their functions. This will be going on until 4/14. No one told me prior and I booked a month in advance. Don't stay here, staff was rude, parking though complimentary was a pain as they do valet and charge for the nightclub so it's a pain to park. I would go anywhere else but not here.

description: The Palm Beach Gardens Marriott is a great place to relax and getaway or to hold your next meeting or event. It has a nightclub right next door for both guests and outsiders convenience. The Blue Fire Grille has many dining options to choose from, and you can also take a dip in our outdoor pool.
